title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Albert Breer about the Niners deciding to keep Jimmy G. What's the agreement between him and the team? Northwestern Football Head Coach Pat Fitzgerald joins the show after upsetting Nebraska in Ireland over the weekend. And Will Ferrell calls to confirm that he's in for our Ireland trip in August 2023.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Albert Breer about the Niners deciding to keep Jimmy G. What's the agreement between him and the team? Northwestern Football Head Coach Pat Fitzgerald joins the show after upsetting Nebraska in Ireland over the weekend. And Will Ferrell calls to confirm that he's in for our Ireland trip in August 2023.
